name: R5_v2_0179_for_R4
title: Cross-version VS for R5.Hl7VSResponseLevel for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0179|2.0.0 for use in FHIR R4. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R5 to R4.

concept.display: Error/Reject conditions only.  Only MFA segments denoting errors must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment for this message
Always.  All MFA segments (whether denoting errors or not) must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment message
Success.  Only MFA segments denoting success must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment for this message

contains.display: Error/Reject conditions only.  Only MFA segments denoting errors must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment for this message
Always.  All MFA segments (whether denoting errors or not) must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment message
Success.  Only MFA segments denoting success must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment for this message
